mapper.select:
SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY reviewDate) as reviewIdx, r.* FROM review r
ORDER BY reviewIdx DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewId, clientId, orderId, optionId, reviewContent, reviewStar, reviewDate, reviewStatus, productId) VALUES(#{reviewId}, #{ clientId }, #{ orderId }, #{ optionId }, #{ reviewContent }, #{ reviewStar }, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{ reviewStatus }, #{ productId })
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(imageDir, imageName) FROM client_image WHERE imageBy = CONCAT(#{ orderId }, '_', #{ optionId })
